APIÔÉÅ

imaginary_time_evolver

Interface for Quantum Imaginary Time Evolution.

LMG_evolution

Script that contains some tries on LMG model's time evolution.

script

Script for collecting data about my thesis on thermal states generation and analysis of some TD properties for the LMG model.

time_evolution_problem

Time evolution problem class.

time_evolution_result

Class for holding time evolution result.

ansatz_creation

Class for tailoring TwoLocal ansatz

operator_creation

Class to generate an LMG Hamiltonian and numerically get eigenstates, thermal averages, ecc.

plotting

Collection of functions to plot the QMETTS_results.

QMETTS

Class to create an instance of the QMETTS algorithm. QMETTS is used to make thermal averages on the state \(\rho_{\beta} = \e^{-\beta H}\). This algorithm evolves each statevector of the basis you indicate to final_beta/2 once and stores all the evolved statevectors for all the intermediate betas. Then, for each intermediate beta, a random product operator (among the ones you choose) is measured on the evolved basis statevector, gaining a new basis stavector to evolve and so on for the number of shots provided. Once a shots-long chain of statevectors is determined, for each intermediate beta, the expectation value of the observable is measured and averaged to get the thermal average. The advantage is that you don't actually evolve a basis stavector to each intermediate :math:`beta/2 ` for all of the shots; you just take the result from the initial "evolving basis phase"'s stored results.

result_handler

Class to define the structure of the QMETTS algorithm instances results.

state_label

Collection of functions that other classes use to work with labels of product operators or statevectors.
